io.github.reggert.reb4j.charclass

Class CharClass.Posix

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.reggert.reb4j.charclass.CharClass.Posix
  • Enclosing class:
    CharClass

    public abstract static class CharClass.Posix
extends Object
    Module containing POSIX-style predefined character classes.
